text: Mario Bergamaschi (7 January 1929 – 18 January 2020) was an Italian footballer. He played as a midfielder. Bergamaschi was born in Crema, Lombardy. He played for 14 seasons in Serie A for Como (1950–1953), Milan (1953–1958) and Sampdoria (1958–1964). He also played for the Italy national team, playing his first game against Argentina in 1954. Bergamaschi died on 18 January 2020 in Crema.
